lemma ineq_dfa_accepting: "(l, m) \<in> (succsr (dioph_ineq_succs n ks))\<^sup>* \<Longrightarrow> list_all (is_alph n) bss \<Longrightarrow> dfa_accepting (ineq_dfa n ks l) (dfa_steps (ineq_dfa n ks l) (the (fst (dioph_ineq_dfs n ks l) ! int_encode m)) bss) = (eval_dioph ks (nats_of_boolss n bss) \<le> m)"
